duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform moderate and/or high complexity patient testing in the clinical laboratory.
Advanced troubleshooting, maintenance, and problem resolution.
Demonstrate strong decision-making skills and ability to work independently.
Take on teaching/training responsibilities as needed.
Work as an effective team member with good relations with physicians, clinic staff, and co-workers.

education_certification.credential: Minimum – Associate degree in laboratory science or medical laboratory technology. Preferred – Bachelor’s degree in a chemical, physical, biological or clinical laboratory science, or medical technology.

One (1) year of experience performing moderate and some high complexity testing in a clinical laboratory for Senior Medical Laboratory Technician; no minimum work experience needed for Medical Technologist.
